folder: Attorney Street & Rivington Street, Manhattan, NY
text:
123-129 Attorney Street, west side, between Rivington and Stanton Streets, showing P>S> 174

Board of Education, N.Y.C.

(1)
Push cart bookseller amid marketing of all kind at Attorney
and Rivington Streets.
September 25, 1927.

P. L. Sperr.

(2)
Another push cart book dealer on Rivington Street, east of Suffolk Street.
September 25, 1925.

P. L. Sperr.
title: Occupations - Peddlers - Books - Newspapers - Stationery.
